page.title: 03Durweston School: Families
page.content: Our class took some sheets home. They had on them some questions about our families and the jobs our parents do. {Mum's job There are more housewives than cleaners. There are six housewives and five cleaners. There aren't any mums who work out of doors. {Dad's job More dad's jobs are outside than inside. A lot of the outside jobs are on farms and the inside jobs are in factories. There are ten dads who work out of doors and nine who work indoors. Two examples of indoor jobs are teacher and mill operator. {Children's ages} In our class fifteen pupils are eight years old and five are nine years old. The youngest child in our families is two months old and the oldest is sixteen years old.
